short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search words for meaning and pronunciation guide

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows people to search for a word and get detailed information about the pronunciation guide. It also shows the various parts of speech including verb, noun or adjective with multiple definitions as per the context of usage.
